Package of functions of the Laboratory of Innovation in Health (InnovaLab) of the Institute of Tropical Medicine "Alexander von Humboldt", Universidad Peruana Cayetano Heredia.

### ðŸŸ£ 1. Requeriments

```{r ,eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(innovar)
library(sf)
library(rgee)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(cowplot)
library(mapview)
ee_Initialize() # edit
```
### ðŸŸ£ 2. Vector layer reading of Peru

```{r ,message=F,warning=F,eval = TRUE}
data("Peru")
peru.region <- Peru %>%
  dplyr::group_by(dep) %>%
  summarise()

glimpse(peru.region)
```

### ðŸŸ£ 3. Exploration Peru map

```{r,out.width="100%"}
mapview(peru.region,legend = NULL)
```

### ðŸŸ£ 4. Transformation of sf object to a feature collection

```{r ,message=F,warning=F,eval=TRUE}
peru.ee <- peru.region %>% 
  pol_as_ee(
    id = c("dep"),
    simplify = 100
    )
```

### ðŸŸ£ 5. Processing data with innovar

```{r ,message=F,warning=F,eval=FALSE}
peru.ndvi <- peru.ee %>%
  get_vegetation(
    from = "2018-01-01",
    to = "2019-12-31",
    band = "NDVI",
    fun = "mean")

peru.def <- peru.ee %>%
  get_def(
    from = "2018-02-01",
    to = "2019-12-31"
    )

peru.pr <- peru.ee %>%
  get_climate(
    from = "2018-02-01",
    to = "2019-12-31",
    by = "month",
    band = "pr",
    fun = "mean"
    )
```

### ðŸŸ£ 6. Processing data for mapping

```{r,echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
peru.def <- read_rds("data")[[1]]
peru.ndvi <- read_rds("data")[[2]]
peru.pr <- read_rds("data")[[3]]
```

```{r ,message=F,warning=F}
peru.ndvi.sf <- inner_join(peru.region,peru.ndvi,"dep")
peru.pr.sf <- inner_join(peru.region,peru.pr ,"dep")
peru.def.sf <- inner_join(peru.region,peru.def,"dep")
```

```{r}

# peru.pr.sf
glimpse(peru.pr.sf)

glimpse(peru.def.sf)
```

### ðŸŸ£ 11. Mapping climate variables with the innovar theme

```{r,message=F,warning=F,fig.height=10,fig.width=15}
pr.plot <- peru.pr.sf %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(fill=`pr2019-01`)) +
  scale_fill_innova(discrete = FALSE,name="Precipitation") +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r,message=F,warning=F,fig.height=10,fig.width=15}
ndvi.plot<- peru.ndvi.sf %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(fill=`NDVI2019-01`)) + 
  scale_fill_innova(discrete = FALSE,name="NDVI") +
  theme_bw()
```


```{r, message=F,warning=F,fig.height=10,fig.width=15}
def.plot <-  peru.def.sf %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(fill=Adef_2019)) +
  scale_fill_innova(discrete = FALSE,name="Deforestation") +
  theme_bw()
```

### ðŸŸ£ 12. Final plot

```{r, fig.height=10,fig.width=15}
plot_grid(pr.plot,ndvi.plot,def.plot,nrow = 1,align = "hv")
```
